page.title: 09ST. COLUMBA'S,ANNAN
page.content: St.Columba's Primary is the only school in our block.It is a Roman Catholic school. It is quite small with just over 60 children attending.There are three classes and three teachers,including the head teacher Mr.Wilson. The present school building was built 24 years ago to replace the old school building which has been converted into a house for Fr.Hainey,Parish Priest of St.Columba's R.C.Church. The children who attend St.Columba's School come from Annan,Eastriggs, Gretna and Springfield.They attend St.Columba's because their parents wish them to receive a Catholic education.There are some children in St.Columba's who are not Catholics. Their parents want them to be educated in a small school.
